TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScrollbarStyles extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates value returned by the following:
.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.ScrollbarStyles InsideInset = int32(16777216)

summary.para: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars inside the padded area, increasing the padding of the view. The scrollbars will not overlap the content area of the view.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.ScrollbarStyles InsideOverlay = int32(0)

summary.para: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars inside the content area, without increasing the padding. The scrollbars will be overlaid with translucency on the view's content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.ScrollbarStyles OutsideInset = int32(50331648)

summary.para: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars at the edge of the view, increasing the padding of the view. The scrollbars will only overlap the background, if any.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.ScrollbarStyles OutsideOverlay = int32(33554432)

summary.para: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars at the edge of the view, without increasing the padding. The scrollbars will be overlaid with translucency.
